players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob was killed, so he was town. We need to discuss and vote carefully. Alice, why did you remain silent?"
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
Diana: "I already confirmed Alice is mafia. Charlie, vote Alice with me to win."
Charlie: "I trust Diana's investigation. Alice, any last words before we vote you out?"
